Deemos looks up in shock as the 8 blasts rain down upon him. He was hit by
every one of them. He cringes and shudders.

Deemos: You coward, you fire at me? You dare fire at me when we were having
close combat? You lowly coward!

Deemos stepped backwards, then turned and ran for a rock, meaning to use it
as his shield from future blasts...

----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 10:30 PM
Subject: Re: War at Chivtron's Base!!!


> ::Aerotaur::
>     He stiffened at the voice behind him.  But only for an instant.  He
then
> shot up higher into the sky.  The blast catches his left knee blowing his
> lower leg off.  He howls in pain.  "WINDLORD!  TAKE HIM OUT!"  He flies
> higher unable to land.  Mech fluid gushes from his leg.  He opens another
> eight shot barrage at Deemos.
>
